ai-patthana16.86:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.86:0.3_0: Don’t sleep at ease, and meditate with rapture and bliss born of immersion.
ai-patthana16.86:1.1_0: So that gives rise to pleasure.
ai-patthana16.86:2.1_0: So there’s no principle for the pleasantries that gives rise to bliss.
